summary: Backend API testing complete for Food Delivery App (أكلة عالسريع). All 16 tests passed covering health check, restaurants, cities, settings, advertisements, authentication, driver location, module imports, and working hours.

minor.issue: Pre-existing issue: old admin account (0900000000) has stale bcrypt hash causing login failures - this is expected per agent-to-agent context

critical_code_review_comments: Server.py is ~4200 lines - models and utils properly extracted to modules but main server.py still very large
Driver location endpoint correctly returns driver_assigned field (line 1508, 1512, 1560)
Working hours check properly uses Asia/Damascus timezone via SYRIA_TZ constant
Module imports verified: models/schemas.py, utils/auth.py, utils/helpers.py, utils/notifications.py all imported correctly

success_rate.frontend: N/A - React Native Expo app, not web-accessible

seed_data_creation: Created test users with TEST_ prefix for registration tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend API tests complete. All 16 tests passing: health, restaurants, nearby restaurants, cities, settings, advertisements, auth register/login/me, driver location (driver_assigned field), module imports, working hours. Test user: 0912345678/test123 works. Frontend is React Native Expo and cannot be tested via web browser.
verified_features: GET /api/restaurants - returns restaurant list with is_open field
GET /api/restaurants/nearby?lat=33.5&lng=36.2 - returns nearby restaurants with distance
GET /api/cities - returns 5 Syrian cities with districts
GET /api/settings - returns app settings (whatsapp, support info)
Server.py module imports from models/schemas.py and utils/* verified working
Working hours check uses proper Syria timezone (Asia/Damascus)
